brief: Datatype for storing and playing movies.

methods.name: frameRate()
methods.desc: Sets how often frames are read from the movie.

methods.name: speed()
methods.desc: Sets the relative playback speed of the movie.

methods.name: duration()
methods.desc: Returns the length of the movie in seconds.

methods.name: time()
methods.desc: Returns the location of the playback head in seconds.

methods.name: jump()
methods.desc: Jumps to a specific location within a movie.

methods.name: available()
methods.desc: Returns "true" when a new movie frame is available to read.

methods.name: play()
methods.desc: Plays a movie one time and stops at the last frame.

methods.name: loop()
methods.desc: Plays a movie continuously, restarting it when it's over.

methods.name: noLoop()
methods.desc:
If a movie is looping, this will cause it to play until the
 end and then stop on the last frame.

methods.name: read()
methods.desc: Reads the current frame of the movie.

description:
Datatype for storing and playing movies. Movies must be located in the sketch's data folder 
 or an accessible place on the network to load without an error.
name: Movie
